pubkey."},"returns":{"_0":"the amount of BGT minted to distributor."}},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. computeReward(uint256,uint256,uint256,in.details: Returns 0 for boost == 0 even if conv == 0, since contract enforces conv > 0.

getMaxBGTPerBlock().details: Exposed for BGT contract to calculate the max burnable native token amount.

returns.amount: The maximum amount of BGT that can be minted in one block.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processRewards(bytes,uint64,bool).details: This function can only be called by the distributor.If in genesis only base rate for validators is minted.

params.isReady: The flag to enable reward minting to distributor (true when BeraChef is ready).
params.nextTimestamp: The timestamp of the next beacon block that was processed.

returns._0: the amount of BGT minted to distributor.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseRate(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

setBoostMultiplier(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

setDistributor(address).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

setMinBoostedRewardRate(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

params._minBoostedRewardRate: The new min boosted reward rate.

setRewardConvexity(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

setRewardRate(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the owner, which is the governance address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

MAX_BASE_RATE().notice: The maximum value for base rate.

MAX_BOOST_MULTIPLIER().notice: The maximum value for boost multiplier.

MAX_MIN_BOOSTED_REWARD_RATE().notice: The maximum value for the minimum reward rate after boosts accounting.

MAX_REWARD_CONVEXITY().notice: The maximum value for reward convexity parameter.

MAX_REWARD_RATE().notice: The maximum value for reward rate.

baseRate().notice: The constant base rate for BGT.

beaconDepositContract().notice: The Beacon deposit contract to check the pubkey -> operator relationship.

bgt().notice: The BGT token contract that we are minting to the distributor.

boostMultiplier().notice: The boost mutliplier param in the function, determines the inflation cap, 18 dec.

computeReward(uint256,uint256,uint256,in.notice: Computes the reward given specified parameters, according to the formula. r := (1 + mul) * (1 - 1 / (1 + mul * boost^conv)) * rewardRate  [0, mul * rewardRate]

distributor().notice: The distributor contract that receives the minted BGT.

getMaxBGTPerBlock().notice: Returns the current max BGT production per block.

minBoostedRewardRate().notice: The minimum reward rate for BGT after accounting for validator boosts.

processRewards(bytes,uint64,bool).notice: Processes the rewards for the specified block and mints BGT to validator's operator and distributor.

rewardConvexity().notice: The reward convexity param in the function, determines how fast it converges to its max, 18 dec.

setBaseRate(uint256).notice: Sets the constant base reward rate for BGT.

setBoostMultiplier(uint256).notice: Sets the boost multiplier parameter for the reward formula.

setDistributor(address).notice: Sets the distributor contract that receives the minted BGT.

setMinBoostedRewardRate(uint256).notice: Sets the min boosted reward rate for BGT.

setRewardConvexity(uint256).notice: Sets the reward convexity parameter for the reward formula.

setRewardRate(uint256).notice: Sets the reward rate for BGT.
